issue.title: [JS] Test arrow data production in integration test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2115](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2115). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the integration tests only treat the JS implementation as a consumer, and we also need to test its ability to produce arrow data.
